snippet: A lawyer for Terry J. Farr, a former trader who has been charged by Britain’s Serious Fraud Office with conspiracy to defraud, said he had no responsibility for setting Libor.
abstract: A lawyer for Terry J. Farr, a former trader who has been charged by Britain’s Serious Fraud Office with conspiracy to defraud, said he had no responsibility for setting Libor.

headline.main: Ex-Broker Charged in Libor Case Responds
